#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<cstring>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
int count=0;
while(true)
{
int a,b;
cin>>a>>b;
if((a==0)&&(b==0))
break;
else count++;
cout<<"Field #"<<count<<":\n";
int arr[a][b];
int i,j;
//char ch;
string s;
for(i=0;i<a;i++)
{
cin>>s;
for(j=0;j<b;j++)
{
if(s[j]=='*')
arr[i][j]=-1;
else
arr[i][j]=0;
}
}
int p;
for(i=0;i<a;i++)
{
for(j=0;j<b;j++)
{
if(arr[i][j]==-1)
continue;
p=0;
if(i>0&&j>0&&arr[i-1][j-1]==-1)
p++;
if(i>0&&arr[i-1][j]==-1)
p++;
if(i>0&&j+1<b&&arr[i-1][j+1]==-1)
p++;
if(j>0&&arr[i][j-1]==-1)
p++;
if(j<b-1&&arr[i][j+1]==-1)
p++;
if(i<a-1&&j>0&&arr[i+1][j-1]==-1)
p++;
if(i<a-1&&arr[i+1][j]==-1)
p++;
if(i<a-1&&j+1<b&&arr[i+1][j+1]==-1)
p++;
arr[i][j]=p;
}
}
for(i=0;i<a;i++)
{
for(j=0;j<b;j++)
if(arr[i][j]==-1)
cout<<"*";
else
cout<<arr[i][j];
cout<<endl;
}
}
}
